# src: LY 13.01; tr. CH
<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_013-1a>¶
** 13 《子路篇第十三》

13.1子路問政。¶
子曰：¶
「先之
勞之。」¶
請益。¶
曰：¶
「無倦。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_013-2a>¶

# src: LY 13.02; tr. CH
13.2仲弓為季氏宰，¶
問政。¶
子曰：¶
「先有司，¶
赦小過，¶
舉賢才。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_013-3a>¶
曰：¶

樊遲出。¶
子曰：¶
「小人哉，¶
樊須也！¶
上好禮，¶

13.6子曰：¶

13.7子曰：¶
「魯、衛之政，¶	KR1a0102_005:16b:8:8:0,KR1c0041_021:10b:4:1:20,KR1c0044_023:8b:8:32:51,KR1e0057_010:14a:3:9:174,KR1e0066_003:14a:6:20:1,KR1e0071_009:37b:4:13:6,KR1e0094_009:48a:6:36:19,KR1g0009_007:4a:2:3:2,KR1h0004_013:1a:79:1:10,KR1h0006_007:6b:5:3:10,KR1h0006_007:6b:7:8:10,KR1h0007_013:5b:10:3:10,KR1h0012_007:6a:1:3:15,KR1h0015_006:22b:1:20:11,KR1h0017_013:12a:5:3:44,KR1h0017_013:12a:9:15:46,KR1h0017_013:12b:3:17:48,KR1h0019_003:5b:11:3:17,KR1h0019_003:6a:2:5:18,KR1h0021_000:162b:1:3:715,KR1h0033_006:11a:10:1:159,KR1h0034_008:20a:6:24:61,KR1h0034_010:10a:3:3:36,KR1h0034_010:12b:8:17:49,KR1h0038_011:6b:5:3:36,KR1h0039_005:37a:3:20:101,KR1h0043_013:11b:11:3:36,KR1h0043_013:15b:7:16:49,KR1h0054_010:4b:9:1:17,KR1h0054_010:4b:11:12:18,KR1h0054_010:5a:4:4:18,KR1j0011_024:4b:8:20:13,KR2a0001_400:1107a:2:1:1106,KR2a0002_045:20b:2:15:1,KR2a0004_047:18b:5:4:1,KR2a0007_079:13a:6:23:2,KR2b0040_107:22b:2:15:3,KR2c0020_004:33b:3:8:35,KR2d0006_100:17a:3:8:4,KR2d0017_018:3b:3:15:8,KR2f0009_044:9a:1:18:33,KR2f0010_019:13b:3:19:30,KR2f0010_022:4a:1:4:30,KR2f0010_023:16b:6:2:51,KR2f0010_024:13a:6:7:40,KR2g0040_004:6a:6:2:8,KR2k0048_054:39b:3:3:15,KR2k0053_059:2a:2:14:12,KR2n0017_004:13b:2:15:18,KR2n0030_005:4b:2:14:4,KR2o0002_016:3b:6:12:4,KR2o0020_055:31b:2:31:97,KR2o0022_020:30a:3:14:186,KR3a0030_008:2a:6:1:1,KR3a0049_003:9b:4:15:0,KR3a0075_002:52b:2:7:3,KR3a0078_059:6b:4:3:9,KR3a0093_016:13a:4:12:1,KR3e0096_008:34a:3:38:21,KR3e0096_010:44b:8:10:19,KR3f0028_000:7b:8:12:44,KR3j0055_006:40a:8:10:3,KR3j0055_015:21b:7:18:2,KR3j0190_025:2a:2:19:2,KR3k0008_019:1b:4:18:6,KR3k0012_622:7a:6:5:5,KR3k0012_999:7a:6:5:13110,KR3k0013_296:13b:7:2:2,KR3k0045_007:6a:4:1:3,KR4b0018_011:2a:2:31:6,KR4c0015_024:21b:2:31:58,KR4c0069_049:9a:5:2:26,KR4c0069_058:9a:5:2:1821,KR4c0069_069:9a:5:2:1109,KR4c0069_072:9a:5:2:976,KR4c0076_010:19a:1:30:19,KR4d0078_021:7b:6:4:12,KR4d0088_008:1a:7:13:4,KR4d0217_054:9a:7:15:13,KR4d0350_007:29b:8:11:29,KR4d0353_019:3a:2:15:4,KR4h0022_072:8b:1:2:12,KR4h0022_862:4a:6:11:4,KR4 兄弟也。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_013-13a>¶

# src: LY 13.08; tr. CH
13.8子謂衛公子荊善居室。¶
始有，¶
曰：¶
「苟合矣。」¶
少有，¶
曰：¶
「苟完矣。」¶
富有，¶
曰：¶
「苟美矣。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_013-14a>¶

# src: LY 13.09; tr. CH

冉有僕。¶
子曰：¶
「庶矣哉！」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_013-15a>¶

「教之。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_013-17a>¶

# src: LY 13.10; tr. CH
13.10子曰：¶

# src: LY 13.12; tr. CH

# src: LY 13.13; tr. CH
13.13子曰：¶
「苟正其身矣，¶	KR1g0009_007:5b:6:3:2,KR1h0004_013:16a:17:1:16,KR1h0005_007:5a:4:2:0,KR1h0006_007:9a:4:3:15,KR1h0007_013:7b:7:3:15,KR1h0015_006:23b:5:2:11,KR1h0017_013:18b:3:3:78,KR1h0019_003:8a:8:3:25,KR1h0020_003:25a:10:3:103,KR1h0021_000:163b:9:3:726,KR1h0026_007:8b:1:3:26,KR1h0034_010:14b:3:3:54,KR1h0038_011:9b:8:3:55,KR1h0039_006:24b:9:8:55,KR1h0043_013:17b:9:3:54,KR3a0059_027:14a:3:5:2,KR4f0059_002:6a:6:1:5,KR5c0113_008:014a:2:11:3

13.14冉子退朝。¶
子曰：¶
「何晏也？」¶
對曰：¶
「有政。」¶
子曰：¶
「其事也。¶

有諸？」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_013-23a>¶

曰：

唯其言而莫予違也。』¶	KR1c0023_029:11a:5:10:2,KR1c0028_018:11a:8:23:13,KR1g0009_007:6b:4:3:2,KR1h0004_013:16a:46:1:19,KR1h0007_013:9a:4:1:17,KR1h0007_013:9b:6:3:17,KR1h0012_007:10b:6:21:27,KR1h0015_006:24b:1:2:11,KR1h0017_013:20b:9:21:90,KR1h0017_013:22a:3:17:93,KR1h0019_003:9b:3:21:29,KR1h0020_003:25b:7:21:105,KR1h0024_012:6a:1:15:4,KR1h0026_007:9b:4:21:30,KR1h0026_007:10a:7:1:31,KR1h0028_010:12b:12:11:63,KR1h0034_010:16b:2:11:63,KR1h0038_011:11a:12:11:64,KR1h0043_013:20a:1:11:64,KR2f0039_001:44b:5:10:14,KR2g0001_002:18a:3:19:1,KR3a0011_004:13b:3:7:2,KR3a0047_021:33b:7:16:6,KR3a0058_009:6a:1:2:48,KR3a0058_009:6b:4:4:58,KR3a0108_018:8b:6:20:22,KR3j0082_008:18b:6:14:3,KR3k0013_743:1b:3:16:2,KR3k0050_077:23b:3:5:4,KR4d0040_034:4b:6:12:2,KR4d0040_057:4b:6:12:293,KR4d0273_029:3a:10:4:889,KR4f0059_003:3a:9:6:4

如不善而莫之違也，¶	KR1a0028_009:6a:2:7:1,KR1b0007_020:14b:5:8:1,KR1b0018_018:6a:7:17:0,KR1g0009_007:6b:5:2:2,KR1h0004_013:16a:49:1:19,KR1h0005_007:6b:2:13:0,KR1h0006_007:10b:2:9:17,KR1h0007_013:9a:5:20:17,KR1h0007_013:9b:7:10:17,KR1h0012_007:10b:7:20:27,KR1h0015_006:24b:2:10:11,KR1h0017_013:21a:1:20:90,KR1h0019_003:9b:4:20:29,KR1h0020_003:25b:8:20:105,KR1h0021_000:164b:5:20:730,KR1h0021_000:165a:5:9:731,KR1h0024_012:6a:3:2:4,KR1h0026_007:9b:5:20:30,KR1h0026_007:10b:6:6:31,KR1h0028_010:13a:5:13:65,KR1h0034_010:16b:7:13:65,KR1h0038_011:11b:5:13:66,KR1h0043_013:20a:6:13:66,KR2b0017_064:11a:3:19:1,KR2c0004_187:15a:4:12:3,KR2f0039_001:44b:6:9:14,KR2f0039_004:18a:8:5:2,KR2g0001_002:18a:4:18:1,KR3a0047_024:19b:6:5:5,KR3a0058_009:6a:2:3:48,KR3a0094_025:2a:8:5:1,KR3j0021_045:6a:2:19:1,KR3j0082_008:18b:8:6:3,KR3k0013_743:1b:5:3:2,KR3k0050_077:23b:4:5:4,KR4d0040_034:4b:7:12:2,KR4d0040_057:4b:7:12:293,KR4d0273_029:3a:11:4:889,KR4e0125_002:12a:7:13:2
不幾乎一言而喪邦乎？」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_013-26a>¶	KR1b0007_020:14b:5:16:1,KR1b0018_018:6a:8:5:0,KR1h0004_013:16a:50:1:19,KR1h0006_007:10b:2:17:17,KR1h0007_013:9a:6:7:17,KR1h0007_013:9b:7:18:17,KR1h0015_006:24b:2:18:11,KR1h0020_003:25b:9:7:105,KR1h0021_000:164b:6:7:730,KR1h0024_012:6a:3:10:4,KR1h0026_007:9b:6:7:30,KR1h0028_010:13a:5:21:65,KR1h0034_010:16b:7:21:65,KR1h0038_011:11b:5:21:66,KR2b0017_064:11a:4:6:1,KR2f0038_002:10b:6:3:6,KR2f0039_038:19b:2:19:2,KR2g0001_002:18a:5:5:1,KR3a0058_009:6a:2:11:48,KR3a0094_025:2a:8:13:1,KR3j0021_045:6a:3:6:1,KR3k0050_077:23b:4:13:4,KR4d0040_034:4b:7:20:2,KR4d0040_057:4b:7:20:293,KR4d0071_020:20a:3:4:20,KR4i0012_048:4a:0:13:104,KR4i0023_008:6a:8:13:0

# src: LY 13.16; tr. CH
13.16葉公問政。¶
子曰：¶
「近者說，¶
遠者來。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_013-27a>¶

# src: LY 13.17; tr. CH
13.17子夏為莒父宰，¶
問政。¶
子曰：¶
「無欲速，¶

# src: LY 13.19; tr. CH
13.19樊遲問仁。¶
子曰：¶
「居處恭，¶

「言必信，¶

硜硜然
小人哉！¶

善夫！¶
『不恆其德，¶	KR1a0001_032:9a:2:1:8,KR1a0001_032:10a:2:1:9,KR1a0117_015:3b:2:11:12,KR1a0117_017:4b:5:1:12,KR1a0119_002:5a:3:6:1,KR1a0142_006:7a:3:3:58,KR1a0142_006:7a:3:15:58,KR1a0148_004:9a:2:4:2,KR1a0148_004:9a:3:2:2,KR1a0148_004:9b:3:17:2,KR1d0052_034:1a:349:1:47,KR1d0068_069:42a:6:13:14,KR1h0004_013:16a:111:1:29,KR3j0082_001:8a:6:8:2,KR3j0082_001:8a:7:9:2,KR3j0082_018:26a:8:7:34,KR5i0056_003:03p006b:9:3:40,KR5i0056_003:03p007a:4:14:40

13.23子曰：¶

「未可也；¶
